column1: NGR is Harewood Lodge. Stated altitude of 440 is 85 ft. too low, OS figure used

There are duplicated readings with MOTTRAM MATLEYS FIELD, particularly from 1915 to the end of the record in 1922 when MOTTRAM MATLEYS FIELD stopped. Over the 8 year period 62 of the 96 readings are duplicated. There are some earlier duplications, perhaps coincidental, except 1909 and 1910 where there are 6 duplications out of 24 monthly readings. It is not clear which readings are correct.
